message: I'm excited to offer you a unique opportunity to acquire a rare and valuable item. I'm open to negotiations, but I have to start somewhere. My initial offer for the product is $1200000.
Thank you for your offer. I appreciate the uniqueness of the item, but my budget is quite limited. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $800000.

I understand that your budget is limited, but I'm afraid $800000 is below my minimum price. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm offering a counteroffer of $1000000. This is my final concession, and I'm hoping we can come to a mutually beneficial agreement.
